title: [BUG] SkiaSharp in Xamarin Forms project with Visual Studio 16.10 causes app to launch but crash immediately
body:
**Description**

Visual Studio 16.10 Xamarin Forms with SkiaSharp builds and deploys but won’t launch past Splash screen.
 
With the upgrade to VS16.10 all of the projects we use SkiaSharp in have stopped working form the PC on devices with Hot Reload.  These same projects work running from a Mac and worked on 16.9.
 
**Expected Behavior**

We can replicate the problem like this:
1)	Create new Xamarin Forms blank project
2)	Add cert stuff
3)	Run on phone – Works great
4)	Add SkiaSharp nuget and SkiaSharp.Views.Forms nuget
5)	Run on phone
     a.	It builds and deploys fine
     b.	The splash screen pops up but immediately there is an error in the output window and eventually the app crashes.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.80.2
- Last known good version:  2.80.2
- IDE:  Visual Studio 16.9 worked, Visual Studio 16.10 does not work, Visual Studio on Mac works
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - iOS:  14.20.0.1
- Target Devices:   
  - iPhoneX
  - iPhone12
  - iPad v8
  
<details>
  <summary>Detailed IDE/OS information (click to expand)</summary>
